mapper.select:
SELECT TA.ID, TA.DELETEOPERATORID, TA.CREATEOPERATORID, TA.DELETEDATE, TA.NEXTID, TA.SERVICETYPE, TA.LASTUPDATEOPERATORID, TA.LASTUPDATEDATE, TA.FILEID, TA.PARENTID, TA.FILENAME, TA.FILENAMEEXTENSION, TA.CREATEDATE, TA.PREID FROM ATTA_ATTACHMENT TA WHERE
AND TA.ID = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ATTA_ATTACHMENT ( ID, DELETEOPERATORID, CREATEOPERATORID, DELETEDATE, NEXTID, SERVICETYPE, LASTUPDATEOPERATORID, LASTUPDATEDATE, FILEID, PARENTID, FILENAME, FILENAMEEXTENSION, CREATEDATE, PREID ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{deleteOperatorId}, #{createOperatorId}, #{deleteDate}, #{nextId}, #{serviceType}, #{lastUpdateOperatorId}, #{lastUpdateDate}, #{fileId}, #{parentId}, #{filename}, #{filenameExtension}, #{createDate}, #{preId} )
mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM ATTA_ATTACHMENT WHERE
AND ID = #{id}
mapper.update:
UPDATE ATTA_ATTACHMENT
DELETEOPERATORID = #{deleteOperatorId,javaType=java.lang.String},
CREATEOPERATORID = #{createOperatorId,javaType=java.lang.String},
DELETEDATE = #{deleteDate,javaType=java.util.Date},
NEXTID = #{nextId,javaType=java.lang.String},
SERVICETYPE = #{serviceType,javaType=com.tx.component.attachment.model.AttachmentServiceTypeEnum},
LASTUPDATEOPERATORID = #{lastUpdateOperatorId,javaType=java.lang.String},
LASTUPDATEDATE = #{lastUpdateDate,javaType=java.util.Date},
FILEID = #{fileId,javaType=java.lang.String},
PARENTID = #{parentId,javaType=java.lang.String},
FILENAME = #{filename,javaType=java.lang.String},
FILENAMEEXTENSION = #{filenameExtension,javaType=java.lang.String},
CREATEDATE = #{createDate,javaType=java.util.Date},
PREID = #{preId,javaType=java.lang.String},
WHERE ID = #{id}
